actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1562.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 11545, a bill to modify the method of determining quantitative limitations on the importation of certain articles of meat and meat products, to apply quantitative limitations on the importation of certain additional articles of meat, meat products, and livestock, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 11545 (Modifying the method of determining quantitative limitations on the importation of certain articles of meat and meat products).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 11545, a bill to modify the method of determining quantitative limitations on the importation of certain articles of meat and meat products, to apply quantitative limitations on the importation of certain additional articles of meat, meat products, and livestock, and for other purposes.
